input_text.Prompt:
The following is a product description written by our marketing expert using the following product keywords and product name.

Product name:
Nike Men's Fly 9-Inch Shorts,Royal,3XL

Product keywords:
100% polyester
two side pockets
zippered pocket on the back right
Brushed waistband with draw cord
Dri-FIT circular knit body fabric
Swoosh logo is heat-transferred at the bottom of the left leg
9.25 inseam (Size Medium)

Product description:
input_text.Response A: The Nike Men's Fly 9-Inch Shorts feature Dri-FIT fabric to help keep you comfortable and dry. They have a brushed waistband with draw cord for a comfortable fit, plus two side pockets and one zippered back pocket for secure storage. The 9.25-inch inseam provides optimal coverage without slowing you down, and the heat-transferred Swoosh logo adds signature style.
input_text.Response B: Nike Dri-FIT 9-Inch Fly Shorts offer a breathable, comfortable feel that's ideal for athletic activity. They're made from a breathable, quick-drying fabric blend of polyester and spandex with a knit construction that's soft and provides a great range of motion. There's a zippered back pocket for secure storage, and the waistband is lined with a soft brushed fabric and has an adjustable draw cord. These shorts feature a Swoosh logo on the bottom left leg and have a 9.25 inseam (Size Medium).
